:::{#hero-heading}

Hi! I'm Vincent Dutordoir, a PhD candidate in Machine Learning at the University of Cambridge, working with professor [Zoubin Ghahramani](https://mlg.eng.cam.ac.uk/zoubin/) and [Carl Henrik Ek](http://carlhenrik.com/). 

Prior to my PhD, I was a senior Research Scientist at [Secondmind](https://www.secondmind.ai/), a position I continued in a part-time capacity during my PhD.

My research focuses on the intersection of statistical methods and deep learning, with applications in generative modelling and sequential decision making. Recently, I have been excited about defining stochastic processes using score-based diffusion models [[1]](https://arxiv.org/abs/2206.03992), [[2]](https://arxiv.org/abs/2307.05431).
